heading: Article Grid
text: This is an example of an article grid. You have the article headers, an enticing, cick-baity blurb and an associated image.

heading: Aaorn De La Cruz Paints
text: The images are some of San Francisco artist, Aaron De La Cruz's latest work on canvas.
